title: Need A Graphics Card
body: I currently have an HP Compaq 8200 Elite Ultra-slim Desktop with an Intel core i5 2400S quad core & 4gb ram but my problem is I have no graphics card & I was told it only takes MxM slot for graphics card.  Can someone please help me find something that will run league at higher settings, thank you very much.

replies.body:
It looks like this PC specifically requires a *low-profile* graphics card. I can't make any specific recommendations, but if you contact a local computer shop or online retailer's order support, I'm confident you can find the right card for your PC.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
